title: Little Rock Central High School National Historic Site: Oral Histories
body: Oral History                            The Little Rock Nine Attend Classes The Little Rock Nine discuss their experiences attending classes at Little Rock Central High School the first year of integration.  Duration:3 minutes, 28 seconds                                State and Federal Involvment The Little Rock Nine reflect on the clash between State and Federal authority that affected their entry into the school.  Duration:4 minutes, 38 seconds                                Student Interaction The Little Rock Nine discuss the social challenges and harassment they and other students faced in the first year of integration.  Duration:4 minutes, 22 seconds
